parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A client token used to ensure the idempotence of the request. This prevents duplicate requests.

parameters.name: Identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the backup gateway. You can query multiple gateways by separating the identifiers with commas (,).

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The page number. The value must be greater than or equal to 0 and cannot exceed the maximum value of an integer. The default value is 0.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of records on each page. Valid values:

- **30**

- **50**

- **100**

> The default value is 30.

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description:
The region of the DBS instance. Valid values:

- **cn-hangzhou**: China (Hangzhou)

- **cn-shanghai**: China (Shanghai)

- **cn-qingdao**: China (Qingdao)

- **cn-beijing**: China (Beijing)

- **cn-shenzhen**: China (Shenzhen)

- **cn-hongkong**: China (Hong Kong)

- **ap-southeast-1**: Singapore

- **cn-hangzhou-finance**: Hangzhou Finance Cloud

- **cn-shanghai-finance**: Shanghai Finance Cloud

- **cn-shenzhen-finance**: Shenzhen Finance Cloud
